entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Rouyn-Noranda
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:59 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rouyn Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: SSE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this morning. Rain mixed with snow this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
